You must be careful when doing the laundry. Even though the forecast may call for rain, the actual weather of the day could turn out differently. You can never fully believe the weather forecast!

After the end of seven days (rounds) worth of laundry drying attempts, the person with the highest score will be declared the winner of the Hoshilympics!

Components:
• 4x selected card stand
• 4x card holder
• 4x point cards (Front: positive points, back: negative points)
• 10x weather forecast cardx (4x sunny, 4x rainy, 2x cloudy)
• 56x laundry cards
• Manual
categories: Abstract Strategy, Card Game, Deduction, Humor
publishers: 大気圏内ゲームズ (Taikikennai Games)

name: Arkana Miłości: Dominacja
description:
Arkana Miłości: Dominacja (Arcana of Love: Domination) is the second expansion pack for Arkana Miłości (Arcana of Love) card game, but it can also be played separately as a standalone game.

Arkana Miłości is a best-selling exclusive erotic card game for couples, released by a Polish publishing company Let's Play. Its sequel, Domination, introduces 64 new cards illustarted with nude photographs by young Polish artists.

7 types of cards are available:

ARCANA – they strip you or your lover.
DARES - they are challenges, which strengthen the bonds of trust.
ACTIONS – they give you an opportunity to make your erotic fantasies real.
SPECIAL ACTIONS – they affect the game and make it more dynamic.
COUNTER ACTIONS – they deny some actions or dares.
TRUMPS - which remain in the game and add effects which change it.
TRICKS - which can be used like Actions or make up part of them.


The game ends when at least one person takes off all her/his clothes and the card Arcana of Love: Domination is played; after that the person who loses the game, has to fulfill the winner’s fantasies until the end of the evening.
categories: Card Game, Mature / Adult, Party Game
publishers: Let's Play, Rebel Sp. z o.o.

name: Battle of the Bands: World Tour Edition
description:
The premier Rock and Roll Card Game is back...but now it's taking over the world! Battle of the Bands: World Tour Edition, the game where you are the star of your own music group.

This new edition represents the natural evolution of the original Battle of the Bands game and its expansions. The game mechanics have been streamlined, tightened, and improved over many years of play. New cards have been added that reflect the changes in music and the industry since the first Battle of the Bands incarnation. Famous cities and venues have been added to truly make this the "World Tour Editon"

With new cool and crazy band members and instruments, reputations that will elevate or cripple your band...you will be armed to the teeth when you hit the stage! Perform Hit Singles, work the Music Biz and ultimately blow your competition off the stage as you fight for Gigs all over the world!

Originally the basic game had a 13+ age level, now it's all ages friendly. BUT if you don't want to play Radio Disney you can add the Sex, Drugs and Rock and Roll expansion for the real band experience! With the Back Stage Pass and Front Row Center cards, you will expand your gaming experience to new heights and depths, just like the the music business. Pop, Rock, Metal, Punk, Funk, R&B, Country (and Western!), Thrash, Swedish Black Metal, Jazz... even the questionable sounds they call "music" today! It's all here for your gaming enjoyment.

A great gateway game for folks who love music but aren't into games...yet.
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Hand Management, Take That

name: Empire: The Game of New York
description:
Empire is a battle game, similar to Risk in game play, set on a map of New York City. The map has NYC (and neighboring Jersey) separated into 6 boroughs, distinguished by color palette: Manhattan in red, The Bronx in orange, Staten Island in yellow, Queens in green, Brooklyn in blue, and Jersey in purple. Each borough contains neighborhoods. These are actual neighborhoods, but the size and boundary are exaggerated in this map for game play. Neighborhoods attached by bridges, tram or subway are also considered adjacent.

The objective is to occupy all neighborhoods on the map with your player cubes by systematically booting out neighboring players by rolling higher dice values than the other players.
mechanics: Area Majority / Influence, Dice Rolling, Player Elimination

name: Water Walker
description:
Water Walker is a game to compete who has walk on the water longest.

Players place 'water' panels closed.
'Water' panel is consist of 'step' and 'dobom'. 'Dobom' means kersplash.
Open the panel, turn player gets a number of "steps" more. Others disrupt by 'dobom' or mislead a turn player by panel array.

name: Think: Gehirn Potential
description:
Games and exercises for brain-fair training. Train playfully your pictorial imagination.

Erweitern Sie Ihr Potential durch Gehirn-gerechtes Training.

There is a booklet from Vera F. Birkenbihl for training. Your partner on the way to a brain-right using your brain-potential. Also there are games to play. 1. Difference (for concentration) : 2. Play with a correspodence in cipher. 3. Undercover mit 36 cards like a memory game.The cards are open. 6 wooden small plates are to cover 6 cards. Each plate with another colour. You play with a dice with the six colours of the plates and have to say what picture is under the plate.

Difference: is a placement game with 4 laying boards and 36 picture cards for 2-4 players. You have to lay down pictures on a board (with the same pictures). The pictures only have small differences. The first player has his cards stored calls stop. With the control film is controlled. For each correct card there is a point. Four rounds, so everyone plays with each panel. The points are added up. The player with the most points wins.

Undercover: is a memory game with 36 cards, 6 wooden discs and a cube. The aim of the game is to remember which motifs of ancient cultures are covered under the individual colored wooden discs, then color cubes with the correct predictions to collect after roll a most picture cards. The wooden plate is then placed on another subject. The cards are open. 6 wooden small plates are to cover 6 cards. Each plate with another colour. You play with a dice with the six colours of the plates and have to say what picture is under the plate.

Another game of the Ravensburger Think Series, a brainteaser/mental exercise game-series. These games are good for mental training, e.g. in creativity, concentration, imagination, logic and so on.

Designer of GEHIRNPOTENTIAL is Vera F. Birkenbiehl.
Designer of DIFFERENCE is Elisabeth Richter.
Designer of UNDERCOVER is Heinz Meister.

name: Tavern Brawl
description:
In Tavern Brawl, each player chooses 5 units which make up their very own adventuring party. The Tavern (game board) is created using modular tiles that can be arranged in many ways. Every turn players may activate up to three of their Units. When activated, a Unit can move, punch, or use its unique power. Each unit has a Life value and when it receives wounds equal to it, it's defeated, and removed from play. The first player to defeat the others Units wins the game!

- Easy to learn, Hard to Master
- Great for new Gamers and skilled ones
- No downtime as every turn is crucial for both players
- Average play time under 20 minutes!
- Immense replay value with hundreds of possible team combinations
mechanics: Grid Movement, Modular Board, Set Collection

name: Robot Turtles Adventure Quests
description: Take your Robot Turtles play to the next level with this limited edition Adventure Pack! Extend your young programmer’s skills with Frog Favorite Cards, designed to teach children to use and combine functions, a key coding concept. Bonus Jewel Tokens add a new programming challenge, as players learn to create increasingly complex code to collect them all. Put these new skills to work and take your Turtles on one of 10 new Adventure Quests, imaginative board setups each with a creative story line.

name: Bathysphere
description:
In the deepest depths of the ocean lie scientific discoveries yet to me made, ancient mysteries still to be solved and vast treasures to be gained by those willing to take the greatest risks. But it will take a brave soul to challenge the crushing pressure and terrors to be found at the bottom of the ocean.

Come aboard the fantastical Nautilus and meet her intrepid crew and the brave Captain Nemo, as they risk their lives for fame, fortune and glory - 20,000 Leagues under the sea.

Bathysphere is a 24 card microgame played across several rounds with each player having an opportunity to be Captain of the Nautilus.

Each turn players simultaneously vote whether to Descend (dive deeper), Ascend (return to the surface) or Abandon Ship! (leave in an escape pod with a small share). Majority rules.

After the vote the Nautilus dives and may face many dangers or crises by turning over a dive card. The crew may elect to use their skills and fix these crises or let them pass, however, if 3 crises go unresolved, Nautilus is destroyed and all hands lost to the crushing depths. Resolving a crisis places it back in the dive deck, meaning it may resurface again.

The deeper Nautilus and her crew travel, the greater the rewards but the greatest rewards are shared only with those demonstrating the most loyalty to the Captain.
categories: Card Game, Nautical, Novel-based, Print & Play

name: The Twilight Saga 3 Game Collection
description: From the box: "Enter the world of the Twilight Saga with this collection of games based on the epic movie series. The more you know about Bella, Edward, Jacob, the Saga movies & your friends, the better your chance of winning. Combine all three games for the ultimate Twilight Saga experience."
categories: Horror, Movies / TV / Radio theme, Trivia
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Roll / Spin and Move, Storytelling, Voting

name: Troc•Sushi
description:
A bluffing game where the aim is collect the most maki and sushi possible by bluffing.

Contents: 18 Fish cards numbered 0-3
Rule cards for 10 languages.
21 Maki tokens.
11 Sushi tokens.

The deck of cards are shuffled and the first player draws the top three cards and secretly
announces a score lower than or equal to 9.
There are then the 2 possibilities.

A.The following player believes the announced score and takes the cards, whilst the first player wins a maki tile.The following player then draws the top card from the draw deck and announces a score still lower or equal to 9.

B.The following player does not believe the score announced.
If the first players announced score was right he shows the cards, puts them beneath the draw deck and takes a maki tile. The following player then misses a turn.
The next player then draws 3 cards from the deck and play starts again.

If a player announces 9 without bluffing he wins 2 Maki tiles.

When a player has 5 maki tiles, he exchanges them for 1 sushi Tile.

Depending on the players and time available the winner of the game is the first to obtain 1 or 2 Sushi tiles.

Inspired by Perudo
mechanics: Betting and Bluffing, Open Drafting, Player Elimination, Push Your Luck

name: Parado
description:
Join the great costume party! Every player dresses up several kids with a joyful mixture of various clothes and accessories. When we are almost dressed up, our guests begin to arrive. As soon as they are all here, we engage in the funniest parade you have ever seen!

Parado is a co-operative game where fun is the central theme. The players help each other to make crazy outfits! A challenging variation with more strategy for older children is included.

name: More or Less 2
description:
More or Less 2 is the sequel to More or Less. While the latter game is most suited for a large number of players, More or Less 2 is designed as a game for up to four players or teams.

More or Less 2 is a quiz game in which players have to answer (numerical) questions. The player whose guess come closest to the actual answers gains a point. But there is a catch! For each question, it is determined whether only guesses that are higher than the actual answer will count (more), or only guesses that are lower (less).

The first player to gain five points wins the game.

name: Alley Thieves: Guild Expansion
description: A small expansion for Alley Thieves. At the start of the game, everyone gets a single guild card. This can be used once per game for a specific benefit (winning a die roll tie, bonus to die roll, etc.).
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Grid Movement, Take That

name: Superhero Geocaching
description:
You battle villains to protect the geocaches that Dr. Apephace so desperately wants to destroy. The clock is ticking!

THE PREMISE

Zzzzzzzzz... “Captain Cache… this is your old friend Dr. Apephace! I am broadcasting this message over a frequency that only you can hear. Since you won’t let me have my fun, I have decided to take away your fun! I have built a device, a Cache-Crusher, which when operational, will destroy every unprotected Geocache in the world. I have released my Thuggles and their teleportation pods to prevent you from rescuing caches. Well, Captain, Cache me if you Can... HAHAHAHAHAH!" .... ZZZZZZZZ

Captain Cache is the world’s greatest superhero. His origin story is a safely guarded secret… well actually he just found a radioactive cache which gave him super geocaching abilities. With Dr. Apephace on the loose, Captain Cache has asked his SUPERHERO FRIENDS TO UNITE AND COLLECT ALL OF THE CACHES TO FOIL THE MAD DOCTOR'S SCHEME!

HOW IT PLAYS

In addition to the base game set up, 6 teleportation pods are placed on the board. Each player will be given a superhero character to play. Every time a geocache is take, a villain appears on a teleportation pod. Villains move about the board and start to destroy geocaches until they are successfully captured by a superhero. The straightforward combat system adds strategy to capturing villains and some superheroes are more well-suited to capturing some villains. It will take team work to win because once 10 caches are destroyed the evil Dr. wins and the superheroes lose!

name: The Emperor of Darkness
description:
There are 3 color streets,
6 mafia families.
And just one 'Emperor of darkness'...

Can you stand alone on the Throne of Dark Street?
Can you build the greatest family?
Can you make the offer that can't refuse?

Be aware! 'Undercover cop' is watching you...

1. This is an auction game based on mafia ranks.
2. Players must consider which card to take by strategically placing his card.
3. Form a strategy that works best for your hand.
4. Players must work to raise his(her) Group to a higher level by recruiting big bosses.
5. Players must be diligent to not let an undercover cop infiltrate his group.
6. Players must strategize so that 2 factions of the same background do not grow together.

Gameplay is dynamic and intense. and Every game is different!
mechanics: Auction/Bidding, Betting and Bluffing, Deck, Bag, and Pool Building

name: Number Strategy Solitaire
description:
Number Strategy Solitaire is a simple solitaire game and is an alternative to patience.

It uses a standard pack of playing cards with the picture cards removed. After shuffling 16 cards are placed down in a 4 x 4 grid and the remaining are placed in a deck face up.

The player draw one card at a time and place it down on top of one of the cards in the grid, but at the same time the player can see what the next card is so he can plan ahead.

When a card is place its value has to be two cards adjacent which adds up the same value or equals ten above its value.
publishers: Games and Puzzles (magazine), Games International, SPI (Simulations Publications, Inc.), Workman Publishing

name: Bill Shakespeare Is Dead
description:
Bill Shakespeare is Dead is a highbrow/lowbrow party game for at least 5 players. There are variants for 3 and 4 players.

Transport yourself back to 17th century England. Ah, the good old days. The smell of feces and dead hobos in the street. The sight of unwashed masses and the complete lack of hygiene. Isn’t it lovely? You and your fellow players are members of the King’s Men, and you make your living saying pretty words to hundreds of filthy people. Better than digging ditches, right? Well tonight is supposed to be the opening night of a brand new play. The crowds are already gathered in the Globe Theatre, and the only thing missing is your star playwright, Bill Shakespeare. As it turns out, Bill had a little too much pickled herring and a lot too much wine and is as dead as disco. Now, armed with nothing but patches of the new script and (sometimes obscene) scribbles in the margins, you all need to put on a show. Good luck!

In Bill Shakespeare is Dead, one of Shakespeare’s famous plays is split into five short acts. During each act, one person acts as the Stage Manager, and two people are randomly chosen to act out the scene. As they go through the script, the rest of the players will have to fill in missing nouns and verbs randomly drawn from the deck and helpfully shouted when there is a blank part in the script. The Stage Manager chooses which nouns and verbs go where. At the end, you can tally your points and declare a winner, if that’s your sort of thing.

name: Switch: The Game of Ups and Downs
description:
Switch is the exciting game in which three to five players race to play cards in sequence. But watch out! Letters and numbers can go up, down, or stay the same... and switch at any time. Be the first player out of cards and win!

Switch (the predecessor to Qwitch) consists of a deck of 64 cards, each containing one of eight numbers (1–8) and one of eight letters (A–H), and a die with plus, minus, and equals symbols. After hands are dealt, one player turns a card from the deck face up and rolls the die. Players race to play the next card from their hands, determined by the symbol on the die.
